item.title: About me
item.description: Sandra Muñoz Revilla Hi! I’m UI/UX artist. I specialize in interface for videogames, I also make animations and motion graphics. I know how to handle myself with Unreal Engine at intermediate level. As well, I am studying a master of technical art in UE to make sure the interface ends up perfect in game. I was born in Madrid in 1995 and my hobbies are playing video games, painting, running and playing with my cats.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Contact me :) You can send me an email or fill this contact form.
